transportAdvice: Tamarindo's compact beach town center is walkable, though the heat and unpaved roads make taxis a practical option for longer trips or reaching nearby beaches. Local taxis and shared shuttle services connect the town to other destinations, while public buses serve the region but may require transfers and are less convenient for tourist areas.
